games.summary: Kevin Durant scored 25 points in his return from a two-game absence, leading the Houston Rockets to a 129-101 victory over the Utah Jazz on Sunday. Houston’s defensive pressure led to the Rockets forcing 17 turnovers and scoring 22 points off those takeaways.
blurbs: ⬆️ Kyle Filipowski (UTAH) played 31 min (season avg: 20). 12 pts, 8 reb, 4 ast.
📋 Reed Sheppard (HOU) made just his 3rd start this season. 9 pts, 6 reb.

games.summary: Payton Pritchard scored a season-high 42 points, Jaylen Brown got his fourth career triple-double and the Boston Celtics barely held on to beat the Cleveland Cavaliers 117-115 on Sunday night after giving up most of their big lead.
blurbs: 📋 Sam Hauser (BOS) made just his 3rd start this season. 7 pts, 5 reb.
🆕 Xavier Tillman (BOS) made his first start of the season. 30 min, 9 pts.
⬆️ Jordan Walsh (BOS) played 38 min (season avg: 19). 14 pts, 11 reb, 1 ast.

games.summary: Josh Hart had 20 points, 12 rebounds and seven assists, Karl-Anthony Towns added 22 points and eight rebounds and the New York Knicks beat the Toronto Raptors 116-94 on Sunday for their fourth straight victory. Jalen Brunson had 18 points, seven assists and six rebounds, and Mikal Bridges and Miles McBride each scored 14 points.
blurbs: 📋 Josh Hart (NY) made just his 4th start this season. 20 pts, 12 reb.
🆕 Jamison Battle (TOR) made his first start of the season. 11 min, 4 pts.
📋 Ja'Kobe Walter (TOR) made just his 3rd start this season. 7 pts, 4 reb.

games.summary: Jalen Johnson hit consecutive 3-pointers late in double overtime and finished with 41 points and 14 rebounds to help the Atlanta Hawks spoil Joel Embiid’s return in a 142-134 victory over the Philadelphia 76ers on Sunday night. Tyrese Maxey scored 44 points for the 76ers and hit a pair of clutch shots, one that forced OT and another that gave them the late lead in the first overtime.
blurbs: ⬆️ Onyeka Okongwu (ATL) played 47 min (season avg: 29). 10 pts, 13 reb, 6 ast.

games.summary: PORTLAND, Ore. -- — Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 26 points, Chet Holmgren had 19 points and nine rebounds, and the Oklahoma City Thunder beat the Portland Trail Blazers 123-115 on Sunday night for their 12th straight victory.
blurbs: 📋 Kris Murray (POR) made just his 2nd start this season. 13 pts, 6 reb.

games.summary: Anthony Edwards scored 32 points to became Minnesota's all-time leader in games with 30 or more points, Julius Randle added 22 points, 12 assists and six rebounds, and the Timberwolves pulled away from the San Antonio Spurs in the fourth quarter of a 125-112 victory Sunday night.
SACRAMENTO, Calif. -- — Zach Edey had a career-high 32 points and 17 rebounds to help the Memphis Grizzlies hold off the Sacramento Kings 115-107 on Sunday night.
blurbs: 📋 Keegan Murray (SAC) made just his 5th start this season. 12 pts, 2 reb.

games.summary: Luka Doncic scored 20 of his 34 points in the first quarter and the Los Angeles Lakers raced to their seventh straight victory, 133-121 over the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday night. Austin Reaves added 33 points and eight assists, Deandre Ayton had 22 points and 12 rebounds and Rui Hachimura scored 14 points.
blurbs: 📋 Gabe Vincent (LAL) made just his 3rd start this season. 6 pts, 2 reb.
📋 Bryce McGowens (NO) made just his 2nd start this season. 23 pts, 7 reb.
⬆️ Micah Peavy (NO) played 30 min (season avg: 15). 13 pts, 2 reb, 1 ast.
